issue.title: [Gandiva] [C++] Make gandiva/node.h public
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3967](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3967). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Because some methods in node.h is useful in bindings.
C GLib Gandiva bindings want to use LiteralNode::holder() to access raw literal data.
